name: Thison’s creation #6 “ UNSPEAKABLE EMOTIONS ”
description:
The brushstrokes in this digital painting convey a message about the rape faced by the maiden of the sea and how she is sometimes silenced by her fear. She bottle’s up her emotions for so long until one day she realises that she is drowning in a storm and what she kept inside is now cracking open and pouring out in tears. 

Original concept and digital illustration by Thison Nayanake from Ceylon Metaverse. Copyright ownership is granted to token holders. Collectors can tag us on Twitter @CeylonMetaverse and/ or message us so we can grant you a letter of authenticity.
